args.subject: Regarding Your Resume Template Request
args.body:
Hi Alice, 

I hope this message finds you well. I received your request regarding the resume template. Unfortunately, I am unable to access the website to download the template for you at this moment. 

If you have any specific requirements or need further assistance, please let me know.

Best regards, 
Emma Johnson
